title: Colossal Cave Adventure
author: Inspired by Crowther & Woods' Original
intro:
You are standing at the end of a road before a small brick building.
Around you is a forest. A small stream flows out of the building and
down a gully.

This is Colossal Cave - the original text adventure, created in 1976.
The cave is filled with treasures, magic, and danger. Your goal: explore
the cave, collect treasures, and find the path to adventure glory!

A voice booms: 'WELCOME TO ADVENTURE!! WOULD YOU LIKE INSTRUCTIONS?'

(The answer is yes. Always yes.)

rooms.name: End of Road
rooms.description:
You are standing at the end of a road before a small brick building.
Around you is a forest. A small stream flows out of the building.

rooms.name: Hill in Road
rooms.description:
You have walked up a hill, still in the forest. The road slopes back
down the other side of the hill. There is a building in the distance.

rooms.name: End of Road
rooms.description: The road ends here at the edge of a great forest.

rooms.name: Forest
rooms.description: You are in open forest near both a valley and a road.

rooms.name: Forest
rooms.description: You are in open forest, with a deep valley to one side.

rooms.name: Inside Building
rooms.description:
You are inside a building, a well house for a large spring. There are
some keys on the ground here. There is food here. There is a bottle here.

rooms.name: Valley
rooms.description:
You are in a valley in the forest beside a stream tumbling along a
rocky bed. The stream flows from the south.

rooms.name: Slit in Streambed
rooms.description:
At your feet all the water of the stream splashes into a 2-inch slit
in the rock. Downstream the streambed is bare rock.

rooms.name: Gully
rooms.description:
You are in a 20-foot depression floored with bare dirt. Set into the
dirt is a strong steel grate mounted in concrete.

rooms.name: Outside Grate
rooms.description:
You are in a small chamber beneath a 3x3 steel grate to the surface.
A low crawl over cobbles leads inward to the west.

rooms.name: Below the Grate
rooms.description:
You are in a small chamber beneath a 3x3 steel grate to the surface.
A low crawl leads inward to the west.

rooms.name: Below the Grate
rooms.description: You are in a small chamber beneath the grate. A low crawl leads west.

rooms.name: Cobble Crawl
rooms.description:
You are crawling over cobbles in a low passage. There is a dim light
at the east end of the passage.

rooms.name: Debris Room
rooms.description:
You are in a debris room filled with stuff washed in from the surface.
A low wide passage with cobbles becomes plugged with mud and debris
here, but an awkward canyon leads upward and west.

rooms.name: Sloping E/W Canyon
rooms.description: You are in an awkward sloping east/west canyon.

rooms.name: Bird Chamber
rooms.description:
You are in a splendid chamber thirty feet high. The walls are frozen
rivers of orange stone. An awkward canyon leads up and west.
A cheerful little bird is sitting here singing.

rooms.name: At Top of Small Pit
rooms.description:
At your feet is a small pit breathing traces of white mist. An east
passage ends here except for a small crack leading on.

rooms.name: In Hall of Mists
rooms.description: You are in the Hall of Mists. Rough stone steps lead down the pit.

rooms.name: In Pit
rooms.description:
You are in a large room full of dusty rocks. There is a big hole in
the floor. There are cracks everywhere, and a passage leading east.

rooms.name: In Hall of Mt. King
rooms.description:
You are in the Hall of the Mountain King, with passages off in all directions.
A huge green fierce snake bars the way! The snake is guarding a crystal bridge.

rooms.name: East Bank of Fissure
rooms.description:
You are on the east bank of a fissure slicing clear across the hall.
The mist is quite thick here, and the fissure is too wide to jump.

rooms.name: Nugget of Gold Room
rooms.description:
This is a low room with a crude note on the wall. The note says:
'You won't get it up the steps'

rooms.name: Dusty Rock Room
rooms.description:
You are in a large room full of dusty rocks. There is a big hole
in the floor. There are cracks everywhere.

rooms.name: At Low Window
rooms.description:
You are at the bottom of a large pit with a 2 foot window in the wall.
The window is too high to reach.

rooms.name: In South Side Chamber
rooms.description:
You are in the south side chamber. There is a crack in the wall here
through which light streams in from the Hall of the Mountain King.

rooms.name: West Side Chamber
rooms.description:
You are in the west side chamber of the Hall of the Mountain King.
A passage continues west and up here.

rooms.name: Secret N/S Canyon Above Large Room
rooms.description: You are in a secret north/south canyon above a large room.

rooms.name: West Bank of Fissure
rooms.description:
You are on the west side of the fissure in the Hall of Mists. There
are diamonds here!

rooms.name: Complex Junction
rooms.description:
You are at a complex junction. A low hands and knees passage from the
north joins a higher crawl from the east to make a walking passage going west.

rooms.name: At West End of Hall
rooms.description:
You are at the west end of the Hall of Mists. A low wide crawl
continues west and another goes north. To the south is a little passage.

rooms.name: In Crossover
rooms.description: You are at a crossover of a high N/S passage and a low E/W one.

rooms.name: At Y2
rooms.description:
You are in a large room, with a passage to the south, a passage to the
west, and a wall of broken rock to the east. There is a large 'Y2' on
a rock in the room's center.

rooms.name: West Side of Fissure
rooms.description: You are on the west side of the fissure. The path slopes down to the west.

rooms.name: Bedquilt
rooms.description:
You are in Bedquilt, a long east/west passage with holes everywhere.
To explore at random select north, south, up, or down.

rooms.name: Swiss Cheese Room
rooms.description:
You are in a room whose walls resemble Swiss cheese. Obvious passages
go west, east, and northeast. A dark corridor leads south.

rooms.name: At Window on Pit
rooms.description:
You're at a low window overlooking a huge pit, which extends up out
of sight. A floor is indistinctly visible over 50 feet below.

rooms.name: At Witt's End
rooms.description: You are at Witt's End. Passages lead off in *ALL* directions.

rooms.name: Soft Room
rooms.description:
You are in the soft room. The walls are covered with heavy curtains,
the floor with a thick pile carpet. Moss covers the ceiling.

rooms.name: You have jumped into the pit and died
rooms.description: That was unwise.

items.name: lamp
items.description: A brass lantern. Essential for dark places.

items.name: bottle
items.description: A glass bottle. It can hold water.

items.name: rod
items.description: A black rod with a rusty star on one end.

items.name: diamonds
items.description: Several diamonds! One of the treasures.

monsters.name: snake
monsters.description: A huge green fierce snake! It's guarding something.

monsters.name: dragon
monsters.description: A massive dragon blocks the path! Its eyes glow with malevolence.

monsters.name: pirate
monsters.description: A pirate springs out and robs you of your treasures!

quests.name: Collect the Treasures
quests.description: Find all the treasures hidden in the cave.

notes: Created 1976 by Will Crowther and Don Woods
The FIRST text adventure game ever
Inspired by Mammoth Cave in Kentucky
